# SecureString.IsReadOnly method

Indicates whether this secure string is marked read-only.

```csharp
public bool IsReadOnly()
```

## Return Value

`true`, if this secure string is marked read-only, `false` otherwise.

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| ObjectDisposedException | The string has already been disposed. |
